mapper.update: UPDATE board SET ctnt = #{ctnt}, title = #{title}, importance = #{importance}, updated_at = current_timestamp WHERE iboard = #{iboard}
mapper.select: SELECT iboard, iadmin, title,importance, created_at createdAt FROM board WHERE importance = 0 ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{row}
